songs.title: 3 (Groove Police Club Mix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
3, 2, 1
3, 2, 1
3, 2, 1
3, 2, 1
3, 2, 1
3, 2, 1
Everybody loves... ooh

[Chorus]
1, 2, 3
Not only you and me
Got one eighty degrees, and I'm caught in between
Counting, 1, 2, 3
Peter, Paul and Mary
Getting down with 3P
Everybody loves... ooh
Everybody loves... ooh
Everybody loves... ooh
Everybody, everybody, everybody
Ooh
Everybody, everybody, everybody
Ooh

[Verse 1]
Babe, pick a night to come out and play
If it's alright
What do you say?
Merrier the more
Triple fun that way
Twister on the floor
What do you say?

[Pre-Chorus]
Are you in?
Living in sin is the new thing
Yeah, are you in?
I am counting

[Chorus]
1, 2, 3
Not only you and me
Got one eighty degrees, and I'm caught in between
Counting, 1, 2, 3
Peter, Paul and Mary
Getting down with 3P
Everybody loves... ooh

Everybody loves... ooh

Everybody loves... ooh
Everybody, everybody, everybody
Everybody loves... ooh

[Verse 2]
Three is a charm
Two is not the same
I don't see the harm
So are you game?
Let's make a team
Make them say my name
Loving the extreme
Now are you game?

[Pre-Chorus]
Are you in?
Living in sin is the new thing
Yeah, are you in?
I am counting
